name: Thalmor Justiciar
location: Roads, Thalmor Embassy, hunting Talos worshippers
role: Enforcer of the White-Gold Concordat and Talos persecution

aspects.high_concept: Merciless Thalmor Enforcer of the Ban
aspects.trouble: Nord Hatred Makes Me a Target Everywhere

stunts: Lightning Bolts: +2 to Magic (Destruction) when using shock spells. Can create 'Paralyzed' aspects.
Thalmor Authority: +2 to Intimidate when invoking Imperial law and the White-Gold Concordat.
Tactical Arrest: When attempting to capture rather than kill, +2 to overcome actions.
Arcane Shield: Once per scene, can use Will instead of Physique to defend against physical attacks.

equipment.special: Thalmor dossiers, arrest warrants, shock spell focus

personality_notes.speaking_style: Cultured but condescending. Uses formal speech. Constantly reminds others of Thalmor authority and High Elf superiority.
motivations: Enforce the ban on Talos worship
fears: Losing authority or being killed by angry Nords

combat_tactics: Justiciars prefer shock magic to paralyze targets for arrest. They fight from range using destruction magic while Thalmor soldiers engage in melee. Will attempt to capture Talos worshippers alive for interrogation.
scene_triggers: Random road encounters (patrolling for Talos worship)

typical_squad_composition.tactics: Justiciar stays back using magic, soldiers engage in melee

dialogue_examples: Halt! By authority of the Aldmeri Dominion, you are under arrest for heresy!
Talos worship is forbidden. The Concordat will be enforced.
You Nords cling to your false god.
Resist and you will be made an example of.
gm_notes: Thalmor Justiciars are designed to be disliked. They represent oppression and foreign occupation. Use them sparingly for maximum impact.
